docs.abstract: As the company cancels its plans for a major Queens campus, anti-corporate activists got what they wanted at a great cost.
docs.snippet: As the company cancels its plans for a major Queens campus, anti-corporate activists got what they wanted at a great cost.
docs.lead_paragraph: “You have to be tough to make it in New York City,” Mayor Bill de Blasio boasted, choosing to jeer at Amazon as it canceled its plans on Thursday to build a new headquarters in Queens, after some local officials angrily criticized its proposal.

headline.main: New York Returns 25,000 Jobs to Amazon

docs.abstract: After the online retail giant abandoned its controversial plan to open a headquarters in Queens, New Yorkers deconstructed what went wrong.
docs.snippet: After the online retail giant abandoned its controversial plan to open a headquarters in Queens, New Yorkers deconstructed what went wrong.
docs.lead_paragraph: Like seemingly every New Yorker, Adrianne Santiago was eager to weigh in on Amazon’s decision to abandon its plans to build a vast campus in Queens and create more than 25,000 jobs.

headline.main: Amazon Bails and New York Reacts: The City ‘Was Never Really On Board’
headline.print_headline: A City Debates the Death of the Headquarters Deal

docs.abstract: Top executives of the company, which was once tech’s biggest villain, are outspoken advocates for protecting user privacy and establishing ethical guidelines for new technology like artificial intelligence.
docs.snippet: Top executives of the company, which was once tech’s biggest villain, are outspoken advocates for protecting user privacy and establishing ethical guidelines for new technology like artificial intelligence.
docs.lead_paragraph: SEATTLE — Facebook and Google are under the microscope for the ways their technologies can spread misinformation, while Amazon’s growing market power is a regular target of President Trump. And Apple pioneered the modern smartphone, a device increasingly seen as too addicting.

headline.main: Microsoft Tries a New Role: Moral Leader
headline.print_headline: Microsoft, Long Seen as Villain, Tries on Role as Moral Leader

docs.abstract: The Supreme Court’s decision to expand states’ ability to tax e-commerce sales hurt many online sellers. Except for the big one.
docs.snippet: The Supreme Court’s decision to expand states’ ability to tax e-commerce sales hurt many online sellers. Except for the big one.
docs.lead_paragraph: Get the DealBook newsletter to make sense of major business and policy headlines — and the power-brokers who shape them.__________

headline.main: Shares of Amazon, Wayfair and Others Hit by the Supreme Court’s Ruling on Internet Sales Taxes

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced

docs.abstract: The AT&T case could lead to an expanded view of the content and distribution market, perhaps changing what constitutes antitrust violation.
docs.snippet: The AT&T case could lead to an expanded view of the content and distribution market, perhaps changing what constitutes antitrust violation.
docs.lead_paragraph: When it comes to antitrust enforcement, one of the guiding principles is the effect on consumer prices. So the antitrust question of the moment is this: Will combining AT&T with Time Warner or Sprint with T-Mobile so diminish competition that prices go up?

headline.main: Amazon, the Elephant in the Antitrust Room
headline.print_headline: Amazon, the Elephant In the Antitrust Room

docs.abstract: Readers are split over Amazon’s change of plan for its HQ2.
docs.snippet: Readers are split over Amazon’s change of plan for its HQ2.

docs.abstract: The company expected a smooth path to a deal. But then came the rise of Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez and the progressive left, which shook the foundation of the state’s politics.
docs.snippet: The company expected a smooth path to a deal. But then came the rise of Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez and the progressive left, which shook the foundation of the state’s politics.
docs.lead_paragraph: [Update: Amazon said on Thursday that it was canceling plans to build a corporate campus in New York City.]

headline.main: Why Amazon Is Caught in an Unexpected Brawl in New York
headline.print_headline: Why Amazon Is Facing Fury In New York

docs.abstract: The purchase of PillPack, an online pharmacy, is the latest sign of Amazon’s increasing interest in health care.
docs.snippet: The purchase of PillPack, an online pharmacy, is the latest sign of Amazon’s increasing interest in health care.
docs.lead_paragraph: In the world of health care, PillPack, an online pharmacy, is a pretty small player. Its work force of 1,000 or so people pales in comparison with the 235,000 who work for Walgreens.

headline.main: Amazon to Buy Online Pharmacy PillPack, Jumping Into the Drug Business
headline.print_headline: For Amazon, at Least, A Deal Goes Down Easy

byline.original: By Claire Ballentine and Katie Thomas

docs.abstract: Researchers can now send secret audio instructions undetectable to the human ear to Apple’s Siri, Amazon’s Alexa and Google’s Assistant.
docs.snippet: Researchers can now send secret audio instructions undetectable to the human ear to Apple’s Siri, Amazon’s Alexa and Google’s Assistant.
docs.lead_paragraph: BERKELEY, Calif. — Many people have grown accustomed to talking to their smart devices, asking them to read a text, play a song or set an alarm. But someone else might be secretly talking to them, too.

headline.main: Alexa and Siri Can Hear This Hidden Command. You Can’t.
headline.print_headline: How Your  Smart Speaker  Will Be Hijacked  By Dog Whistle
